name: Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2014, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
102 A.3d 417
Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 129 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 2014.
